# ğŸŒç¬¬äºŒéƒ¨åˆ†ï¼šTypeScriptæ•°æ®ç±»å‹

# 1.åŸºæœ¬æ•°æ®ç±»å‹

// JavaScriptä¸­ä¹Ÿæœ‰çš„
let age: Number = 10;
let myName: String = 'æœ±æ˜†é¹';
let married: Boolean = true;
let arr1: number[] = [1, 2, 3]
let arr2: Array<number> = [1, 2, 3]

// å…ƒç»„
let yuanzu: [string, number] = ['æœ±æ˜†é¹', 20];

// æšä¸¾ï¼ˆæ€§åˆ«ï¼Œæœˆä»½...ï¼‰
enum Gender {
  boy,
  girl
}

// å¸¸é‡æšä¸¾
const enum Colors {
  red, green, blue
}
let myColor = [Colors.red, Colors.blue]

// ä»»æ„ç±»å‹ï¼ˆå°±ä¸ä¼šè¿›è¡Œç±»å‹æ£€æŸ¥äº†ï¼‰
let root:any = document.getElementById('#app')
root.style.color = 'red'

// HTMLElement
let element: (HTMLElement | null) = document.getElementById('#app');
element!.style.color = 'red'; // !éç©ºæ–­è¨€

// null undefined æ˜¯å…¶ä»–ç±»å‹çš„å­ç±»å‹
let x: number;
x = 1;
x = undefined;
x = null;

// never ä»£è¡¨ä¸ä¼šå‡ºç°çš„å€¼
// void è¡¨ç¤ºæ²¡æœ‰ä»»ä½•è¿”å›å€¼ï¼ˆvoid å¯ä»¥è¢«å¤åˆ¶ç»™ null | undefinedï¼Œneverä¸èƒ½è¿”å›ä»»ä½•å€¼ï¼‰
function voidFn(): void {
  console.log('void')
}

// Symbol
const s1 = Symbol('key')
const s2 = Symbol('key')

// BigInt
const max = BigInt(Number.MAX_SAFE_INTEGER); // 2 çš„ 53æ¬¡å¹‚ - 1

// ç±»å‹æ¨å¯¼
let mName = 'æœ±æ˜†é¹' // string ç±»å‹
// ä¸ºä»€ä¹ˆä¸€ä¸ª æ•°å­—ç±»å‹ å¯ä»¥ç”¨ .toString() ä¸æ˜¯å¯¹è±¡æ‰æœ‰å±æ€§ä¹ˆï¼ŒåŸå› æ˜¯å› ä¸º åŒ…è£…ç±»ï¼Œå†…éƒ¨ new äº†

// è”åˆç±»å‹
let zName: string | number;
zName = 'æœ±æ˜†é¹'
zName = 22;

// ç±»å‹æ–­è¨€
let kName: string | number | any
// kName.toFixed(2) ä¼šæŠ¥é”™ï¼Œå› ä¸ºä¸çŸ¥é“ä½ æ˜¯ä¸æ˜¯numberç±»å‹ï¼Œè¿™æ—¶å€™å¯ä»¥ç”¨ç±»å‹æ–­è¨€
(kName as number).toFixed(2)
// (kName as number as any) // åŒé‡æ–­è¨€

// å­—é¢é‡ç±»å‹
const up:'Up' = 'up';
type Direction = 'Up';
function move(direction: Direction) {}
move("Up"); // å¯ä»¥å®ç°æšä¸¾çš„æ•ˆæœ

// ç±»å‹å­—é¢é‡
type My = {
  name: string,
  age: number
}
let myN: My = {
  name: "zkp",
  age: 22
}

# 2.å‡½æ•°å’Œç±»

// å‡½æ•°
// ? æ˜¯å¯é€‰å‚æ•°
function hello(name: string, age?: number, say: string = 'hello'): void {
  console.log(say + name + age)
}

// å‡½æ•°çš„é‡è½½ï¼ˆå‡½æ•°å‚æ•°ä¸ä¸€æ ·ï¼‰

// ç±»
class Person {
  name: string;
  getName(): void {
    console.log('my name is zkp')
  }
}

let p1 = new Person()
p1.getName();
